name: Bewear
description: The Strong Arm Pokémon. It waves its hands wildly in intimidation and warning. Life is over for anyone who doesn’t run away as fast as possible.

abilities.name: Fluffy
abilities.description: This Pokemon is vulnerable to fire-type moves, but takes half damage from any melee attack (that isn't fire-type).

abilities.name: Klutz
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot hold an item.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.
